physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Ms. D reported poor sleep, frequent awakenings, diminished appetite, excessive worrying, headaches, muscle aches, feelings of worthlessness and pessimism, inability to enjoy things, psychomotor agitation, and restlessness.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially, Ms. D experienced worsening insomnia and nervousness after starting citalopram but improved significantly after 6 weeks with combined treatment (citalopram and benzodiazepine). Remission was achieved by the end of the 10th week.
